description: Nice 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring soft erotica line drawings (women in panties) hand drawn by LineArtBabe, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: The Mucus Empire
description:
A fairly challenging slaughter map by me.

It could be a little difficult for beginners or somebody who prefer more relaxing gameplay, you can just lower the difficulty.

Have a good time!

name: Lofi Hip Hop Worlds to Study in
description:
Welcome to a bunch of chill 3D worlds full of unique study spots with Lofi Hip Hop music and ASMR sounds. You can explore them to relax while you take a break from studying.

When it's time to study again, you can set a timer and put these worlds in the background. Nothing is trying to hurt you. You don't need to fight anything to win. You set your own goals, and you can customize your own soundscape to help you meet them.

name: Par 1 Golf 6
description: 18 holes, 18 lives, its you against the 2d golf course in Par One Golf 6! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The sixth installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real GOLF!

name: Aladdin: Save the Princess
description: Come and save the princess in this game with exciting new levels! Simple to control!! You can play with one hand very fast. Luckily Princess's friend has found you for this job. Good Luck! Let God be with you!

name: Red Hands: 2-Player Game
description: Red Hands – 2-Player Game is based on a cool two player game known as "hot hands", "slaps", "tap hands", "dual hands" or "slap jack". It's a fun game for people of all ages who like to play competitive games.

name: Cab Ride
description: Drive a train, forever, through a dreamlike land. Transport passengers to their destination. Watch the world go by. Listen to chilled out chiptune music.

name: Street Karate 3
description: Street karate 3 is a game in the genre of Beat'em up, in which you have to fight in an unequal duel with many opponents.

name: Destiny Island
description: Destiny Island is a very short computer game. You play a man who visits his memories. You can walk and talk to mannequins about 7 sins. Associate essence with anything comes to your mind.

name: Idiot
description: Utopian island. Calm and happy life. Food is synthesized from cartridges. The night comes at your will. And you don't care about life outside the island. You know exactly what is bad there - this is what the state said, and it is always right.

name: Girls Pinball
description: "Girls Pinball" is a relaxed casual game. Players control a horizontal board to block the falling ball. When the horizontal board hits the ball, the ball will bounce again. After the ball hits the square, it will be eliminated, and after all the squares are eliminated, you can pass the level.

name: Cat Go! Ultimate Challenge
description: Help a cute kitten to save Barsikgrad from unkind looter cats and restore peace in a cozy town.

name: Sheep Love
description: Little game of living with cute sheep "MeiMei"

name: Land of Heroes
description: Fight fearless monsters, improve your skills, gather allies and explore a whole new fantasy world

name: Y.E.T.I
description: Y.E.T.I is a third-person shooting game that focuses on the classic shooting and precision mechanics. Fight against anything that threatens humanity. Or rather, whatever the government says that threatens humanity. You play as an investigation agent, involved in special missions.

name: Post Cards
description:
A collection of three small games.

Each one - ocean, desert and grove - comes with its own goal and control scheme. See if you can complete each one, or simply enjoy the scenery.

name: Rogue Sentry
description: A difficult twin-stick adventure shoot-em-up about a sentry droid who turns rogue to save humanity.

name: Dragon Creek
description: Ever wanted your own dragon? Dragon Creek is a dragon raising simulator where every dragon is procedurally generated. Enter a seed at the shrine and see your dragon come to life. Care for your dragon as you train it for battle and compete in tournaments!

name: Doodle World
description:
Doodle World is an all new game for play on the NES! Play as Doodle and help him save his world from the evil King Eraser and his office supply minions.

Run, jump and pounce on enemies as you navigate your way through this colorful side-scroller!

name: Monster's Mall
description: A management game about shopping for little monsters, like ghosts, zombies and more.

name: Keep Out
description:
Keep Out is a horror and mystery puzzle adventure Game.
A whole story of Keep Out is from Devota Hill in 2044. You are "Mr. M", the toy of a wise and benevolent monarch. Explore and Find Secrets of Devota Hill and HumathScience.

Players explore Devota Hill by manipulating Mr. M in 3D, Side-scrolling views.
You may have to fight, dodge, or sometimes get stuck against aggressive rats, human beings who kill animated toys, and other aggressive toys that don't serve the benevolent lord Mr. M. Sometimes you have to use parts of the toy that were killed to survive. Mr.M is threatened or helped in this environment. You are the lord of toys. With all your toys paying attention to you, think only about salvaging the world of threatened toys!

name: Force Five
description:
An unreleased fighting game for the atomiswave arcade system developed by Anchor Inc. in 2004.
Later reworked and released as Jingi Storm: The Arcade for the Sega NAOMI.
It was made available as a homebrew port for the Sega Dreamcast in early 2021.

name: Muv-Luv Unlimited: The Day After - Episode 03 Remastered
description: The stakes grow higher in this latest episode of Muv Luv Unlimited: The Day After! The shadow of nuclear annihilation looms over mankind, as France places the city of Seattle in the crosshairs. Can humanity overcome this crisis and unite to face the BETA?

name: Muv-Luv Unlimited: The Day After - Episode 02 Remastered
description: Muv Luv Unlimited: The Day After continues! The Shogun has come to Seattle, and with her, an installation that might solve the ongoing food crisis. But tensions simmer beneath the surface, as an unseen enemy waits for its chance to strike.

name: Risk of Rain 2: Starstorm 2
description: Starstorm 2 is a work-in-progress adaptation of the Risk of Rain 1 mod "Starstorm". It currently features four new survivors, three new monsters, over 20 new items and equipment, and numerous new challenges to shake up your runs.

name: Vlinder Gacha
description:
Love collecting sweet dolls from claw machines? Can't resist trying your luck at the claw machine arcade? Want to become a world-renowned gacha doll designer? Look no further!

Vlinder Gacha is here to make your dreams come true!

Experience the joy of doll-catching and express your creativity by dressing up as a gacha princess and giving your fashion paper dolls makeovers! Join the fun of being a fashion doll designer and download the doll makeup and dress up game for girls now!

name: Travel Mosaics 14: Perfect Stockholm
description: The Walkers invite you to take a walk along the narrow-paved streets of Stockholm and enjoy the views of its picturesque canals and restrained architecture. Learn interesting facts about the most fascinating landmarks of the capital of Sweden while completing challenging puzzles!

name: Walk With Me
description: This is a collage of memories when I lived in Germany at the age of five. I remember the memory of staring at the ground, it was snowing.

name: FNaF Multiplayer: Forgotten Pizzeria
description: A free-to-play multiplayer game where the action takes place at night, in the insanely big, randomly generated Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. Players are randomly placed in one of the two available roles: nightguards and animatronics. Guards rush to find tools to complete maintenance work while the animatronics hunt them down with their special abilities.

name: Cloudspotting
description: a nonbinary date

name: Demon Doif
description: The demon Doif requires your assistance minion. He is hungry. Find the items he wants from amongst the pile. Do not get them wrong. Feed Doif the correct items! If a particular item isn't available, stun him and pull the lever to give him memory loss and request a new item!

name: The USB Stick Found in the Grass
description: This is a forensic challenge game – find out who the owner of the USB stick was and reconstruct their story.

name: Ero Snooker
description: Play snooker and admire the girls.

name: Outbreak: Epidemic - Definitive Edition
description: The infection goes nation-wide in Outbreak: Epidemic, an action-focused co-op survival horror adventure. Featuring the great Outbreak series gameplay with greater mobility, crushing difficulty and more camera options than ever before. Alone or in 2-player local co-op, fight through the Campaign story mode, the wave-based Onslaught Mode and all new Experiments Mode scenarios. Choose your survivor, class and level up to unlock new buffs for your survivor as you face the nightmare. You'll need to manage your inventory and supplies carefully, so make every bullet count!

name: Gnome: Jigsaw Puzzles
description: This puzzle game helps your kids develop matching and fine motor skills. You will love these wonderfully Gnome pictures and will improve their spatial skills while having fun!

name: Please Wake Up
description: “Please Wake Up” is a memory horror game. It has simple and accessible, yet engaging, gameplay that gives the player a fear of their own mind. As you look around the room, objects will change when they are not visible. Click on the objects if they have changed.

name: Dual Cars
description: Dual Cars is funny drive racing game where you need to control the cars and try to reach the Finish line. Easy to play Hard to master. :-) Are you ready to test your driving skills?

name: Space Break Head to Head
description: Space Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive space environment. Unique animated bricks tumble down toward the users paddle along with Sci-Fi Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Space Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Slobbish Dragon Princess
description: After discovering a strange, lizard-like being on the side of the road, things start to change for Takeru. And wouldn’t you know it, that lizard was actually the princess of the dragons! Now begins their bizarre, yet down to earth daily life.

name: Spirit Cleaning
description:
Spirit Cleaning is an action/visual novel hybrid game where you play as The Cleaner, a spring cleaner visiting a residential house in the suburbs.

However, this job isn't a normal one—each room of the house is haunted by the tragedies that befell its many residents and their bloodied crime scenes.

And they're all anime girls.

name: Escapeworld Dilemma
description: Kidnapped from your everyday life, you find yourself in a large theme park that feels more like an escape room. Solve puzzles, explore 12 themed islands, find resources, and use your wits to escape while resolving your dilemma ...

name: Gravels of Endless War
description: Gravels Of Endless War - new turn-based online strategy game. You don’t have to lvl up, grind or do quests. There are no ads or P2W elements. Build your own unique team, discover the special abilites and start your Endless War for the War Relics.

name: Populus Run
description: Populus Run is a goofy runner with sugary obstacles. Watch out for massive falling cupcakes, rolling donuts, and rapping macarons in FiftyTwo's new game.

name: Partition Sector
description: Blow up your friends - and snakes - in 6 game modes including Battle Royale, Capture the Flag, King of the Hill and Snake Hunter! Up to 20 players in local multiplayer, with online play via Steam Remote Play Together - only one player needs to own the game!

name: Lost Caves
description: A 2D collect-a-thon in which you explore caverns filled with underground ruins to find treasure and to hopefully find your way back to the surface. Collecting treasure from chests accumulates your wealth, and the wealthier you become, you further you can progress.

name: Daring Dungeoneer
description: Dive deep into dungeons in this Card Battle RPG. If you are defeated, you lose everything you gained in that dungeon. The big question is, do you "Dare to Dungeon" or do you flee with what you've gained? You decide when enough is enough in this exhilarating game of "chicken" between you and the dungeon.

name: Live Inc.
description: Live Inc. is an online 2vs2 heist game where two opposing players play in a cat and mouse scenario and their team members play as overseers of the map. Teams can use unique mechanics to interact with the map and must work together to outsmart their opponent.

name: Abyss the Forgotten Past
description: Abyss The Forgotten Past, is a 2D platform game with RPG-based mechanics, with a large diversity of collectible items, increasing the difficulty as you progress. The story is based on rediscovering itself, after an unfortunate event, Leonnor sets out on a journey to discover everything about his past, with special abilities, where monsters, magic and heavenly beings exist. Enter a personal search that will surprise you with each discovery ...

name: A Painter's Tale: Curon, 1950
description: “A Painter's Tale” is an adventure game that tells the story of the tiny Südtirol village of Curon Venosta by mixing reality and fiction. The old Curon was flooded by the waters of Lake Reschen in 1950 due to the construction of a dam. What lies beneath the bell tower still emerging from the lake?

name: Don't Get Bit
description: It's the zombie apocalypse and Cassie, a sarcastic 18 year old armed with only her wits and a kitchen knife, must get to her uncle’s farm. Keep Cassie alive in this turn-based strategy game as she battles the undead across thirty levels trying to survive and not get bit.

name: Finger Fortress
description: We fused typing and strategy to provide you the best experience of a 1v1 typing game. Choose your race and lead your soldiers to break through the opponent fortress in the fingers of speed and wisdom!

name: Everybody Wham Wham
description: Compete to build the best snowman in a story-driven, winter adventure! Make friends at the festival, tune in to the Wham Wham Radio Station and uncover the hidden truth behind Wham Wham the Snowman-man. Can you build, decorate and sabotage your way to the festival grand prize?

name: Manalith
description:
Explore a surreal and mystical island as you search for the ancient Manaliths. Discover beautiful vistas, secret passages, and dozens of items.

- Walk, run, climb, swim, and glide through meadows, woods, jungles, and caverns.
- Forge your own path, exploring the island however you wish.
- Use your magic to summon mystical torches to light your way, sense nearby items, blast through secret walls, and fast-travel across the island.
- Collect items that extend your stamina, improve your magical abilities, and more.
- Wander and explore at your own pace, without dodging traps, fighting enemies, or scrounging for questionable foods.

name: Firescout
description: Firescout is a Single- and Multiplayer Shooter Game. Many Gamemodes to Play with your Friends, With Randoms and with Bots. Open a New World with Firescout.

name: Annalynn
description: Annalynn is a 2D platformer made in the style of arcade games from the early '80s. Collect the coins, grab the bonus foods, and turn the tables with blinding rubies! Think you've got what it takes to go for the high score?

name: Big Bia
description: This world is originated form a “Big Bia”, with many secret waiting for you to discover. Collect your heroes and minions and experience a roguelite pixel art style dungeon crawling game. Challenge dungeon with different card collected through the game. Welcome to a world without a Big Bang!

name: Blue Flame
description: Blue Flame is a fast paced top-down action game set in a medieval fantasy world. Take the role of the last pyromancer and restore order to a kingdom in which fires only emit cold.

name: Golf Party
description: Mini Golf and mini games! Play with up to 20 friends online.

name: Rangok Skies
description: War has started! Rangok Skies is a vertically scrolling arcade shooter inspired by the genre classics. Highly replayable with 4 different characters, each with their own unique ship, weapons, and bombs. Includes 2-player local co-op.

name: Buddy Mission: Bond
description: Close in on the truth with your partner.

name: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & The Secret Fairy - Premium Box
description: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & The Secret Fairy, Ryza costume downloadable content: "Dawn Sonnet", Tao’s Notebook (visual book), B2 cloth poster featuring special illustration, Clear file x 2, Acrylic mini character charm

name: Melancholy Love
description: Melancholy Love is a Yuri Visual Novel between an elite and a misfit in an All-Girls' High School. How will sparks flare between the two?

name: Saving Mr. Sparkles
description:
Saving Mr. Sparkles is a challenging 2D platformer. The main character's cat (Mr. Sparkles) runs away from home, and she must chase after him.

It has short but difficult levels, where the player has to use his/her momentum to make it to the end.

name: Re:Zero – Starting Life in Another World: The Prophecy of the Throne - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Untrusted
description:
Untrusted is an online multiplayer (10 to 16 players) hacking social deduction game currently in development, inspired by the Werewolf/Mafia genre and similar games. 
 
In Untrusted, hackers from the fictional NETSEC group are tasked with hacking a specific server on a computer network. NETSEC members must use their skills and wits to outsmart the undercover AGENTs that will try each night to perform arrests or have other players become snitches for them. 
 
The game ends as soon as the NETSEC group gains root access of the target node or when all AGENTs or NETSEC members have been eliminated from the game. 
 
Role playing, deception and deduction are key aspects of the game, which currently features 19 playable classes with more than 50 unique skills. 
 
Join the official discord server at Discord.playuntrusted.com - Alpha Playtest are regularly scheduled - be a part of the development!

name: Way Back Home
description: "Way back home" is a 2D horizontal board horror puzzle game. It takes the Republic of China period from 1905 to 1926 as the background of the times. With a large number of exquisite original paintings, rich playing methods, excellent music and dubbing, delicate script and narrative game style, it creates a strong historical...

name: BigHardSun
description: You were exiled to an old castle in the desert. Command people, monitor their condition, explore, improve the castle, and make tough decisions - all to survive! And while you're struggling with the hottest summer, the temperature is only rising, and the storms won't subside.

name: Runster
description: Runster, It's an online game for exercise which is controlled by your body movement in the real world to elevate both gameplay experience and your health. Moreover, it works without requiring any extra gadget just a smartphone, and a PC is enough.

name: Another Dawn
description: A quiet holiday on a tropical island suddenly becomes your worst nightmare when a ruthless criminal organization kidnaps your family. Battle against hunger, thirst, unscrupulous mercenaries and wild creatures in order to stay alive and save your beloved!

name: Angel Wings
description:
Upon answering a mysterious phone call, you awaken in an unfamiliar place filled with new faces…
Through intricate relationships and thoughtful introspection, will you be able to unravel the reason you are here?

name: Groov
description: Groov is an XNA game. Use the left and right joysticks to maneuver the craft and fire musical bullets.

name: Alice's Wonderland 4: Festive Craze
description: Sin descripción

name: Donkey SMS
description: Sin descripción

name: Ocaso
description: Ocaso is a difficult combat focused action game with only boss fights, inspired by Furi and Titan Souls.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Majo-tachi no Tanabata ha Amakunai
description: Sin descripción

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Dare no Ochakai?
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Bernkastel is invited to a tea party hosted by Lambdadelta and Featherine, but traps abound.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Valentine Paper
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Battler receives letters from various characters for Valentine’s Day.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Nana Shimai no Valentine
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Ronove bakes chocolate for Valentine's Day and the Seven Sisters of Purgatory seek out recipients for it.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Tenshi 17-sai Higashi-shi - 44a
description: An extra arc featuring Ange and Virgilia creating new pairings for their yaoi doujins.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Sakutaro, Rengoku-san he
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Sakutaro is taken away from Maria and sent to Purgatory, where he must purify his sins if he wishes to reunite with her.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Warera no Kokuhaku
description: An extra arc originally included in the PC release of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku, which demonstrates the creation of a new game board of Beatrice's from the ground up, showing readers how the mystery is set up and how fantasy elements are used to adorn the tale.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Aru Ryourinin no Zakki
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Gohda tells of the time he first signed on to serve the Ushiromiya family and the strange events he witnessed.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Memoirs of the ΛΔ
description: An extra arc originally included in the PC release of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku where Lambdadelta talks about the wishes she’s granted, remembering in particular the wishes of some certain little kids.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Bern no Tegami
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Bernkastel writes to a friend about the rules of Beatrice's game.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Shoukanshi Kara no Tegami
description: An extra arc explaining the basics of magic.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Last Note of the Golden Witch
description: An extra arc originally included in the PC release of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku where Battler, Ange, and Beatrice are summoned to challenge a new opponent, Piece, who assembles a new game board and asks them to figure out her identity.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Kinrou Kansha no Hi no Okurimono
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where the cousins all pick out gifts to give to their parents for Labor Thanksgiving Day, but Beatrice uses her powers to sow chaos.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Jessica no Haha no Hi Present
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko When They Cry Tsubasa where Jessica summons Zepar and Furfur to help her get a present for Natsuhi, and the results are not quite what she expected.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Jessica to Koi no Omajinai
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa, where Jessica seeks the help of Zepar and Furfur once again, and this time she receives a book of spells.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Jessica to Satsujin Senpuuki
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Hane where Jessica writes a play and shows it off to Battler and Shannon when Lambdadelta interferes and sucks the three of them into it. The trio must see the story to the end if they want to escape alive.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Mahou ni Tsuite no Juuyou Jikou
description: An extra arc that is a discussion between Beatrice and Maria about the importance of magic.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Game Master Battler!
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa, where after finding the truth and becoming Game Master, Battler tries to write a scenario for the next episode. As Game Master, Battler can do anything, and many people are more than willing to secure a role.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Gisho no.XXX
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Hane where Battler Ushiromiya returns to Rokkenjima after a six-year absence, but instead of having a friendly reunion with his family, he has plans of murder.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Shinjin Shisai Cornelia
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa tells the story of Cornelia, who is excited to get recruited into the Great Court of Heaven, but the workplace atmosphere is not quite what she expected.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Beatrice no White Day
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa tells the story of The Seven Sisters of Purgatory, who all expect to receive gifts from those they gave chocolates to, but Beatrice plans to ruin the holiday after feeling left out.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Arigato for 556
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa tells the story of a recently arrived recruit named Chiester 556 who loves thanking everybody.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Aru Witch Hunter no Shuzai Tape
description: An extra arc bundled in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku where a Witch Hunter tries to learn the method behind Kinzo Ushiromiya's wealth.

name: Biome: Mr. Self Destruct
description: Industrial-themed 1024³ level with a lava-flooded foundry, a humid cave system and an icy outside area; originally started for the Xmas Jam 2019. It uses custom textures from various sources and comes with a new skybox. The map source is included.

name: Gachinco Tennis S
description:
Gachinco Tennis S is a tennis battle game with flashy magical ball attacks that can be activated with a single button.

There are 24 characters with different magic and abilities. The game starts with 12 characters and others are unlocked by defeating them in invasion matches after winning in the tournament mode.

The game uses a tag team match with original rules, after selecting 2 characters it plays like a singles match but the characters can swap at any time during a rally. Seize victory by using two types of magic and swap characters depending on the situation.

name: Rakugaki Kingdom
description: Rakugaki Kingdom is a turn-based RPG for smartphones that allows you to draw and create your characters to raise them and make them battle.

name: Electric Trains
description: Electric trains is very dynamic and interactive train simulation game with a third-person view. The game has easy and intuitive controls. You can drive the train and control railroad switches ahead your train. Heavy traffic and railroad configuration will make missions more difficult to accomplish. You can transport passengers, coupling and carry cargo rail cars to earn maximum scores.

name: Pathfinder 08
description: Pathfinder 08 is a fun and challenging adventure. It is a platform game with a focus on exploration and retro inspiration with some RPG elements.

name: Stranded
description: Test your imagination. build stuff, kill things, explore endless amounts of sea, cave and island. go into it blind and you just might find your way out This is a fun survival island based game where the player finds themselves in a terrible situation out on sea and wakes up on a mysterious island.

name: Annual Intruders
description: A home invasion horror game about participating in an annual challenge.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Vietnam & Kublai Khan Pack
description: The Vietnam & Kublai Khan Pack introduces Bà Triệu as the leader of Vietnam, Kublai Khan as an alternate leader of either China or Mongolia, a new Monopolies and Corporations game mode, as well as a new district with new buildings.

name: Gizmos: Interstellar Voyage
description: Space adventures are waiting for you!

name: Flying Frags World Tour
description: Robots have torn open a portal to invade earth, everyone has mysteriously disappeared, the world has begun to tear apart. Sprint across the skies of robot-invaded Earth as you try to end the invasion.

name: Dungeons & Cocks
description: The plot of the game is dedicated to the life story of Matthew Delaney, an elderly Bon vivant who was forced to leave his country, after it had been captured. He reaches the shores of the New World, but the unknown land does not welcome old Delaney as warmly as he planned...

name: The Medium: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The Medium (game)
- Original Soundtrack - co-composed by legendary Japanese composer Akira Yamaoka and Arkadiusz Reikowski
- The Art of The Medium - an official digital album that will lead you through the game's unsettling world.

name: Gods Will Fall: Valiant Edition
description:
The gods' rule over humanity has lasted for millennia. They demand to be worshipped and to those who don't submit to the gods' will; merciless death awaits.
Experience the trials of 8 Celtic warriors in their plight to sever the gods' grip on humanity. Every man and woman who can muster a blade will form your clan and take on legions of beasts in each of the gods' realms.
Succeed and see legends born. Fail, and lives turn to dust.

The Valiant Edition Includes "The Valley of the Dormant Gods"

The Valley of the Dormant Gods content will be released episodically as three new levels within the game, post launch. Each level will include a new god, alongside the other bonus content.

name: Warp Out
description: A VR exclusive shoot 'em up, Warp Out projects you in four different worlds full of enemies to destroy. Only your skill can bring you to the top of the leaderboards!

name: In It Together
description: In It Together is a retro inspired 2D puzzle platformer where you go into dangerous areas and solve problems to retrieve suitcases from the pesky Bandidos Gang. You have no attacks. What you find on the ground is what you need to use to take out the enemy.

name: Prison Architect: Going Green
description: Prepare to get your hands dirty Wardens! Prison Architect: Going Green brings agriculture to your compound, introducing farming, produce exports, and a whole bunch of contraband.

name: Knights of Riddle
description: Step into Riddle, a vast world teeming with magic and mysteries to explore! See what happens as you explore and meet new fellow knights and uncover mysteries and challenges as you progress through the world learning the beautiful story and lore behind this magical world.

name: Daylife in Japan: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Game Features: - Beautiful and originally created Pixel Art animated puzzles to assemble; - Original music composed specially for this game; - 5 different levels of difficulty.

name: Space Blast Zom A Matching Game
description: Enter an all-new world of Space Blast Zom – A Matching Game. Where evil alien bosses view for the rule of the galaxy! Fire planets to make matches and destroy the deadly stream of enemy planets. Guide your race to victory! Will you succumb to the perilous pitfalls, or can you rule the galaxy in this cluster-busting challenge?

name: Cooking Festival
description: Cooking Festival is a delicious management sim that will let you bake, fry and grill around the world! Become the master chef the cooking world has been waiting for and whip up some homemade pancakes, grill juicy ribs, bake aromatic original Italian pizzas, and serve delicious ice cream that everyone loves! Cooking is incredibly easy - just tap & serve! Start exploring the world and prepare whatever cuisine you like!

name: Bricks Pinball 4
description: Bricks Pinball is a brick breaker game which combines the game mechanics of a traditional brick breaker and a flipper game. Play through 15 exciting levels as you aim for a high score.

name: G-Mode Archives 29: Zanac
description: Zanac is a classic shooting game that made a name for itself in the gaming industry in 1986. This mobile app version of the game recreates the original game, including hidden elements. The game system has been rearranged to make it easier to play. In addition, this title has been improved with the G-Mode archives. The "Arrange" mode allows you to fly through the air more intensely and smoothly. The game includes two modes: "Arrange" mode, which is more intense and smoother, and "Original" mode, where you can enjoy the nostalgic graphics of the time. There are eight types of special weapons. Each weapon has its own unique characteristics, and the power of each weapon increases with successive attacks. The thrill comes from the large number of bullets that the enemy attacks with. Use the special attacks to your advantage to defeat the final boss!

name: Arcade Archives: Halley's Comet
description: Halley's Comet is a shooting game released by Taito in 1986. Take control of your ship to defeat the enemies from Halley's Comet, and save the planets of the Solar System. Destroy space rocks to collect parts to power up your ship. Skillfully navigate the stage to become stronger while stopping the enemy.

name: Strange Field Football
description:
Strange Field Football is a 3D cartoon pixel style 5v5 football game with up to 4 local players.

This is a game that allows light gamers to have the fun of football. There is no fouls, no out of bounds, the only rule is to score more goals within the specified time. Pro gamers can also find their fun. Players' Hit point, use of special skills, and differences in tactics, every small operation may affect the final result.

Key Features
• 3D Cartoon pixel style
• Every player has his own special skills
• Take advantage of scene elements
• Up to 4 people to play locally
• Game framerate stable at 60 fps

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 1
description: The new year ushers in new ways of ensuring players always have things to do in Sea of Thieves. Our first Season delivers a new route to earning rewards by building your Renown, a trove of Trials and Deeds to tackle along the way, a permanent new Voyage type for the Merchant Alliance, new and returning time-limited Events, more freebies to grab through Twitch Drops and fresh Pirate Emporium stock including the Plunder Pass!

name: Flesh Eating Geriatric Internet Predator
description: You are a projectionist tasked with assembling a long lost Horror Film for it’s first screening ever. A girl obsessed with vampires ends up meeting the real horrifying thing but he's far from the sparkly man of her dreams

name: Cargame
description: Cargame is new type of racing game where you can just drive around of cities and race tracks. You can choose what track or city u want a drive and go drive like a furious head. Cargame controls from most realistic car driving simulators.

name: Journey to the Savage Planet: Employee of the Month Edition
description:
Welcome to the Pioneer Program! In this upbeat & colorful, co-op adventure game you play as the newest recruit to Kindred Aerospace. Dropped onto an uncharted planet with little equipment and no real plan, you must explore, catalog alien flora and fauna and determine if this planet is fit for human habitation. But perhaps you are not the first to set foot here... Onward to adventure! Good luck - and mind the goo!

The game will have Stadia exclusive features, all extra content, enhanced photo mode, 60FPS and new visual refinements and updates.

name: Uno: Fenyx's Quest
description: The most famous card game hosts a legendary showdown! An all-new game mode inspired by the mythical world of Immortals Fenyx Rising, UNO Fenyx’s Quest plunges you into the marvelous Golden Isle and its mysteries and wonders. Avoid the traps of Typhon, free the gods from their curse, and wield their mighty powers to be the first one to get rid of your hand. Olympus awaits you.

name: UNO: Ultimate Edition
description: Get the complete collection of one of the most iconic games with the UNO Ultimate Edition, containing UNO, UNO FLIP!, UNO Fenyx's Quest, plus themed cards featuring Just Dance 2017, Rayman, and more.

name: Ghost in the pool
description: A bizarre campus legend, take you into the traditional Japanese black and white comic horror story. Witness the familiar scenes and contemplate the terrifying moments.

name: Farm Frenzy: Refreshed
description: Grow and make resources to trade with the city, care for animals, and build your dream ranch in Alawar's famous Frenzy Farm with a modern twist!

name: Hidden Lands
description: These lands are paused in time, split apart. Find their differences to to bring them back to life. Discover ancient civilizations through their lost treasures.

name: Fate of the Storm Gods
description: Harness wind, earth, fire, and all the forces of nature to destroy your enemies! Will you stabilize the broken magic of the weather, or revel in its chaos?

name: The Book of Shadows
description: What happens when you and your girlfriend uncover a mysterious book and then accidentally activate it? Can you keep Alex one step ahead of those who want the book while at the same time figure out where am I? What does this book do? Why do these other people want it?

name: Miska's Cave
description: Miska's Cave is a unique action-centric side scroller with strategic components and animated with pixel art. If you love completing challenging games that require varying strategies, this game is for you.

name: Steel Division 2: Nemesis - Battle of Rimini
description: Nemesis: Battle of Rimini takes place during Operation Olive, set in mid-September 1944, which saw the Allies attempt to break through the German-held Gothic defensive line on the Adriatic coast.

name: Pink
description: After Yellow, Red, Black, Blue and Green: can you make the screen pink in each of the 50 levels?

name: Immortals Fenyx Rising: A New God
description: As Fenyx, overcome the legendary trials and challenges of the gods of Olympos to change the Greek Pantheon and fulfill your destiny.

name: Save Farty: The Trivia Game
description: "Save Farty" represents a real low point in worldwide trivia games. Self-improvement and the advancement of knowledge have given way to idiocy and unbridled masochism. This is perhaps the sickest game that can be enjoyed alone or with friends since Russian Roulette.

name: Burn! SuperTrucks
description: The championship regulations in the ¬´ SuperTrucks ¬ª mode require you to get over large metal ramps at different strategic points, where control and anticipation in each jump are essential to ranking among the best drivers. Compete in championship mode on different tracks, located and designed throughout the entire USA. Drive from north to south, from the coast to the highest peaks. Win the gold cup and raise it over your head at each of them. Any experienced driver can mess up and cause an accident. But don't worry! because you have the option ¬´ flashback ¬ª, which turns back the clock to just before the accident for a new chance, and it's all done in slow motion (bullet time). With several weather settings, each race will always feel different at all times. In training mode, you can practice on an oval circuit with the vehicles that have already been unlocked. Get the best times in the time trial mode and upload them to the world ranking. The challenge is to be number 1 on the world podium among your colleagues, friends or family. Burn! SuperTrucks offers you a passionate and extreme driving experience, with incredible skids and dizzying jumps, where your adrenaline will be through the roof at all times. But don't forget! You yourself are your worst rival.

name: Zeepkist
description: Zeepkist is a bright and colorful physics based soapbox racing game, with up to 4-player split-screen multiplayer and an integrated level editor.

name: Among Stars and Robots
description: Lead Cubot through over 50 challenging puzzles using the commands at your disposal without getting stuck in a loop!

name: The Friends of Ringo Ishikawa & Arrest of a Stone Buddha
description:
The friends of Ringo Ishikawa is a unique and immersive existential open world beat 'em up - experience the story, meet new characters, and explore the town.

In Arrest of a stone Buddha, a hitman is searching for an answer in 1970s France.

name: Wobbledogs
description: A 3D pet simulation where you raise your own personal hive of mutating dogs, physically simulated all the way down to their guts! Wobbledogs is a casual and chill sandbox for players of all ages who want to care for their very own virtual pets in a surprising, unique, and stress-free environment.

name: Milkcraft
description: Milkcraft is a multiplayer RPG social sandbox game. In this mysterious world of Norse mythology, you can freely build your own territory and village, or start a survival adventure to challenge the dark dragon. Come with Us!

name: Handball Manager 2021
description: Finally state of the art handball management. Prove yourself as a manager and trainer in the daily business of professional handball.

name: Brain Frame
description:
Note: Brain Frame is a game jam title done over 15 hours with a team of 5 - plus some special appearances from "actors".

Do YOU have what it takes to jack into the net and use your ultimate hacking skills to crack your enemy's defenses?

Hackmaster, the benevolent gray hat, was wandering through cyberspace one day when he came upon a suspicious garbage file hidden on the servers of one of the world's biggest tech giants. He investigates the contents of the garbage file, but the server's defenses activate once they're alerted to the presence of a foreign user in the system.

You'll have to use every hacking trick in the book to blast algorithms and viruses at your opponents to ensure their coroutines never run again.

-Single level prototype with hardcore platforming and best-in-class roguelike functionality
-Integrated narrative FMVs - the pinnacle symbiosis of graphics and story
-Art, Music, SFX, and UI/UX inspired by humanity's last golden era - the 90s

name: Gods Will Fall
description: The gods’ torturous rule over humanity has lasted for millennia. Bent on cruelty and suffering, they demand to be served with blind worship through an oath of fealty pledged from every man, woman and child. To those who don't submit to the gods’ will; a slow and merciless death awaits.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku - Limited Edition
description: This edition includes the game Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku, Witches Acrylic Stand, Portrait Art Collection, Golden Butterfly Pin Badge, One-Winged Eagle Coaster.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku
description: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku is a remake that bundles the base games with new content as well as all the extra arcs in Tsubasa, Hane, PC release of Saku and two brand new ones.

name: Golden Force
description: The Demon King has set his sights on Muscle Island, a hitherto heavenly and peaceful place where life was good. The dark figure has installed his army there and persecutes the population with the help of his generals. Wasting their last coins in taverns, the mercenaries of the dreaded Golden Force take advantage of their last vacation moments when they receive a new contract: to defeat this evil new ruler and reclaim the mountain of gold in his possession. When there is gold and the promise of a good fight, you can count on the Golden Force to save your loaves!

name: Devour
description: Devour is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Stop a possessed cult leader before she drags you to hell with her. Run. Scream. Hide. Just don't get caught.

name: Frontier Quest
description: Rebuild a frontier town and become acquainted with its community in puzzle-RPG Frontier Quest! Explore the frontier, collect materials and defeat monsters with the right equipment and in order to restore the town and uncover the secrets of the frontier.

name: Gal*Gun Returns
description: Part shooting game and part dating sim, the game tells the story of a young man becoming so incredibly popular with the opposite sex, that he has to fend off his array of admirers!

name: Disgaea 6: Defiance of Destiny
description:
The first new Disgaea game in six years is here! Meet Zed, a zombie that has risen above them all except one - a God of Destruction!

Can a mere Netherworld zombie rise up and destroy a god? Find out in the newest installment of the Disgaea series! Features such as Super Reincarnation, 3D visuals (a first for this series), and adjustable gameplay settings make this the perfect game for both new and old Disgaea fans!

name: The Medium
description: Discover a dark mystery only a medium can solve. Explore the real world and the spirit world at the same time. Use your psychic abilities to solve puzzles spanning both worlds, uncover deeply disturbing secrets, and survive encounters with The Maw - a monster born from an unspeakable tragedy. The Medium is a third-person psychological horror game that features patented dual-reality gameplay and an original soundtrack.

name: Sarawak
description: Literary mystery game set in Oxford and Borneo.

name: Ven VR Adventure
description: Ven VR Adventure is a single-player VR platform game. You happen to meet Ven on his unknown planet, invaded by Bruce Nelson, who wants to destroy the magical world.

name: Chroma: Bloom and Blight
description: Chroma: Bloom and Blight is a free to play card game for veterans and beginners alike. All cards and game modes are available to you for free. Compete for the number 1 spot on the ladder or play with crazy decks against your friends without having to worry about the costs of cards. Coming 2020.

name: Sword of the Necromancer
description:
Sword of the Necromancer is a dungeon-crawler action RPG with Rogue-like elements where you can revive your defeated enemies to make them fight alongside you.

Turn your foes into allies using the forbidden powers of the Sword of the Necromancer and help Tama reach the dungeon's depths in order to gain enough power to bring Koko back from the dead.

Gather a little army of monsters, equip yourself with weapons and relics and level up to take on the guardians that stand between you and your objective

name: Metal Unit
description: Metal Unit is a story-driven roguelite, side-scroller action-platformer. Play as Joanna, a soldier sent on a mission to capture her treasonous sister. Wear the suit M-Unit 11 to battle against monsters and aliens, and discover the truth about humanity.

name: Blackberry
description: Psychological horror, the action of which takes place in the depths of the mind of the protagonist. Over and over again childhood fears emerge from the subconscious in an adult guise. How long the journey into the depths of the mind will drags on is up to you.

name: Olija
description: Olija is a game about Faraday's quest, a man shipwrecked then trapped in the mysterious country of Terraphage. Armed with a legendary harpoon, he and other castaways try to leave this hostile country to return to their homelands.

name: Tohu
description: Tohu is a classic Point & Click adventure game. It takes place in a small world based on fish-planets, floating in an ether. You will explore it with an unusual little girl who keeps a secret: she can turn into a Cubehead - her alter-ego, who can carry big things and make big deeds.

name: Curious Expedition 2
description: Curious Expedition 2 is a turn-based narrative roguelike set in a reimagined version of the late 19th century that uses procedural gameplay and story elements to create completely unique and epic adventures every time you play.

name: Birdie Crush
description:
Fantasy golf with beautiful 3D graphics and gorgeous course-specific skills!
Go on a variety of field trips with adorable caddies! Strategize, aim for the right timing and swing to clear various courses! Challenge yourself in a global live match!
Show off your skills and win!

name: Motor Strike: Racing Rampage
description: Welcome to the craziest savage experience! Destroy your friends in this demented action racing rampage game, play alone, with the split screen or in the online mode. Enjoy +24 tracks, 14 Vehicles and 7 weapons with 6 different game modes and feed your hunger for power!

name: International Basketball Manager
description: International Basketball Manager is finally back! Lead a basketball club to the glory and train your squad to become the world’s greatest team of all. Enjoy sport management as never before!

name: Academia: School Simulator
description: Academia : School Simulator is a management game that lets you design, construct, and manage the high school of your dreams! As the school Principal, watch your students as they get bullied, find love, flunk exams, and basically just try to get through the roller-coaster ride that is high school. Will you offer the best teachers and facilities or cheap out and build giant classrooms with a 1:100 student to teacher ratio? It's all up to you!

name: With Every Heartbeat
description: With Every Heartbeat is the first and only book of the With Every Heartbeat series.

name: Paw Patrol: The Movie Learning Phone
description: Engage your young pups with imaginary play and learning with four games and six activities.

name: Hellway
description:
What's up, man? I'm MR. SILVA, the fastest and best driver in this city! So, if you need to arrive at your event or meeting on time... I'm the right guy, I AM SURE YOU WON'T BE LATE! Soemtimes we have a crazy traffic jam and the clock is our enemy, but don't be afraid, because we'll slide into the sapces between the cars and buses!

So... are you ready? DO YOU THINK YOUR HEART CAN HANDLE IT? What's your destionation and time for your appintment?

Let's go... FAST!

name: Mario and Luigi: Superstar Simulator
description: Mario and Luigi: Superstar Simulator focuses on the battle elements of the Mario and Luigi series and enhances them with new enemies to fight and characters to play as. The playable characters range from the usual such as Mario, Luigi, and Bowser, but there are also some characters you wouldn't expect in this format such as Paper Mario, Sonic, or even Peppino from Pizza Tower. Each battle has something special and unique to bring to the table, like a new mechanic while dodging or a phase 2 that changes things up. There are some extra things to do as well, like playing minigames or going on bounty missions by collecting wanted posters in the overworld/HUB area.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening DX Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening DX.

name: Disparate Realities
description: A set of 9 slaughtermaps designed to be played from pistol starts. 10th map is an end map with no gameplay (MAP08).

name: Santego Special Unit
description: Santego Special Unit is a mod for Max Payne 2: The Fall Of Max Payne based on Half-Life: Opposing Force.

name: Breathe In
description: Breathe in is a game about Meditation. You control your focus, and must navigate your way to the 'breathe in' and 'breathe out' pick ups in order to focus on your breathing. Breathing lessens your tension which builds up over time, if you let your Tension get too high, you will lose the game.

name: My Maid Cafe Romance
description:
Life’s not easy trying to make college tuition while studying in high school. Especially when your school doesn’t allow part-time work. Luckily, you’ve managed to keep your job as a delivery man secret for now… Besides that, though, life’s going good! You’ve got three cute friends that any guy would envy. What more could you ask for?

But one day, when a secret delivery takes you to a maid cafe, you discover your three friends are all breaking school rules by working there! Now that you know their secrets, you’ve got no choice but to help them out. Will you be able to survive this crazy situation without the school knowing what’s going on?!

name: Halo: The Master Chief Collection Season 5 - Anvil
description: Titled after both the Anvil Initiative and ANVIL Station, Season 5 added the AKIS and Mariner helmets into Halo: Reach, years after being teased in promotional material for the Defiant Map Pack in 2011, alongside nameplates and additional cosmetic customization options to Halo: Reach and Halo 3, including 12 armors from the cancelled Halo Online for the latter.

name: Go Rally
description: With loads of tracks, cars, a career mode, multiplayer time challenges and an awesome track creator, Go Rally is the only rally game you'll ever need! Draw a line on your screen, tap the 'race' icon, and instantly drive your very own track! Add hills, bridges, checkpoints, trackside banners, houses and terrain - create the circuit of your dreams, then share on-line and challenge your friends, and the world, to beat your times.

name: Quake: Torrent of Impurities
description: Finnish mappers of the first acclaimed "SMEJ" came back for an episode jam 2, the sequel to Realm of the Lost: seven large maps in varying themes, based on the Copper mod (included). It also features four new monsters, a new boss, a few new sounds, and music tracks. The map pack then inspired the community to create a "SMEJ Map Jam", with no intervention from the original SMEJ team.

name: Liar, Lioness
description: Who serves a servant? [A fairy visual novel about power]

name: Märchen Forest
description: Mylne, an apothecary, searches the Mysterious Forest for ingredients so that she can brew her potions. But things soon take a dramatic turn from simple errands—eventually, Mylne finds herself caught up in an unsolved mystery, requiring her to take on what lies in the Underground Ruins, deep beneath the forest...

name: 13 Laurel Road
description: A game about places and the memories they hold.

name: Retro Hockey Coach 2021
description: Retro Hockey Coach 2021 puts you in charge of your favourite city as you attempt to reach the play offs and beyond… can you get your hands on the cup and win the ultimate prize?

name: 100 Hidden Mice
description: Hidden object game in the laboratory setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Difficult and interesting! Very large location!

name: Triblock
description: A little bit of Tetris, a little bit of match 3.

name: 1001 Jigsaw Home Sweet Home Wedding Ceremony
description: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Home Sweet Home is an exciting puzzle game and holiday feeling in 500 high-quality photos.

name: Heroism
description:
Heroism is an Action RPG game with some clicker game elements, that let's you play either as an active RPG, or as an idle game.

Explore the world, brave dangerous dungeons, gather Heroism, build a party, find precious items, go up levels, learn skills, unlock upgrades, and kill lots and lots of monsters.

This game looks like a Roguelike, but there is no permadeath. Actually, there is no punishment for death at all, other than a short pause, where you may consider your life choices and spend your precious death points.

name: MasterPlan
description: Masterplan is an easy-to-use task management and project planning software made for indie developers and creatives.

name: Neko Papala
description: An energetic college boy and 4 abandoned lovely cats use their love songs to make these 4 cats become sexy kitty maids.

name: Zombie Drift
description: Will you beat all levels and become the drift killer? Zombies are everywhere! Unfortunately, you don’t have any weapon. But you do have a car! Now show those zombies who is the boss and show your drifting skills!

name: Battlecruisers
description: Build the ultimate warship to attack and defend against frigates, artillery, and bombers. Journey across the flooded Earth, touring the remains of humanity’s greatest landmarks while engaging in explosive tactical gameplay.

name: Tale of Immortal
description: Tale of Immortal is an open-world sandbox based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow to become immortal, conquer the beasts from the Classic of Mountains and Season, make your choices carefully and grasp your own destiny.

name: Magellania
description: Defeat your enemies with the power of love, friendship, and violent military aggression in Magellania, a hardcore tactics-RPG set in outer space.

name: Megalith
description: A short story about the last man on Earth. Made for a game jam.

name: Iro
description: A little exploration game set on a lonely planet.

name: Lines Splitter
description: Lines Splitter is a 2021 line puzzle game where you will have ultimate fun by solving line riddles. Lines Splitter has taken the puzzle standards to a whole new different level where creativity meets the brain power. In this brand new riddle game 2021 you will find one hundred exigent levels, a rich collection of Smileys, soothing sound and challenging puzzles that will cling you to the gameplay.

name: Royal Tower Defense
description:
Lands of orcs have expanded in the last few decades and defined new borders. New borders which are dangerously close to us...

They depleted resources on theirs lands and it's only a matter of time before they try to put their hands on our Kingdom. Diplomats were already send to peacefully ask orcs to back off, but they’ve never returned. The sign was clear - there is no place for negotiations…

name: Hyposphere: Rebirth
description:
Hyposphere is not simply a classic "marble" platformer, it may also be the most beautiful and one of the most harcore marble ball game ever! 
 
A cunning artificial intelligence, along with the help of a clever virus, has taken over every computer in the world! There is only one chance to fight back: pass the tests generated by this dastardly digital demon! 
 
Dare you accept the challenge and prevent the coming of the end of the information age? 
 
There's only one way to find out: take control of Hyposphere and dive into the adventure!

name: B100X: Auto Dungeon RPG
description:
B100X is an "auto dungeon RPG" that you can easily enjoy during your free time.
With "Full Auto Battle" and "Anything Synthesis System", both easy operation and complicated capture are compatible. There is also an automatic lap function, so you can enjoy it even during matching of competitive games.

name: Nectar of the Gods
description: An unquenchable multiplayer real-time strategy game where bugs clash over the sweet nectar of sugary beverages. From Beetle Brigade to Spidey Party, you will artfully master strengths and shortcomings to topple boba shops and coffee bars. The countertop mayhem has begun.

name: Ryte: The Eye of Atlantis
description: With a little help from the Historia Time Travel agency, set sail to the city of Atlantis for a VR Myst-ical adventure : Fill in the sandals of an Atlantean who recently broke out of prison, wield supernatural powers, solve esoteric puzzles and try to prevent the End of Atlantis !

name: Citizens Unite!: Earth x Space
description: Citizens Unite!: Earth x Space includes both the Citizens of Earth and Citizens of Space games. This time the two adventures have united with brand-new elements. Recruit 88 Citizens with unique abilities to save the Earth in both time-periods! Time travel back-and-forth between Citizens of Earth and Citizens of Space, unlocking new content and revealing the true ending!

name: Hidden Shelter
description: Hidden Shelter is a first-person horror game, focused on exploration, developed by the White Vortex studio. It is under development on the Unreal Engine for Windows PC. Explore the area in search of clues and escape from a bloodthirsty being who wants to kill all those who approach the place.

name: Rushdown Revolt
description:
Rushdown Revolt is a new free-to-play Offline, fast-paced, and combo-centric platform fighting game. Experience 12 unique characters, best-in-class rollback netcode, and a fresh take on platform fighter combat.

The game's signature Spark mechanic lets you cancel any attack into a dash and sets you up to combo opponents like never before.

Online account owners can host their friends with the offline version for free in their online lobbies!

Rushdown Revolt officially launched on May 26th, 2023.

name: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World: The Prophecy of the Throne
description: The popular light novel/anime series, Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World - is coming as a Tactical Adventure game!

name: Disjunction
description: Disjunction is an upcoming single-player, cyberpunk, stealth-action RPG set in the dystopian underworld of New York City in the year 2048. The game follows the interconnected narratives of three characters as they unravel a mystery that will change the fate of their city.

name: Clickertale 3
description: An Undertale fangame in which Chara and their allies must defeat an entity known as ClickGaster who's main goal is to destroy their universe following the unintended destruction of his own.

name: Take a piss like a woman
description: A game where you have a conversation while taking a piss.

name: 9999 in 1
description:
Ah, the 90's... Techno music, arcades, personal computers... and TONS of cheap chinese LCD games.
Remember that LCD game that was in each single bazar? The one that had MANY copies of Tetris? Well, 9999 in 1 is a replica of that machine but in your Spectrum!

8 different games packed into a single 48k program emulating the look and feel of these LCD machines, pure 90's retro fun!

name: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cute Cock Clicker
description: Poke sexy men with objects until they take their clothes off!

name: Luigi Stardust Adventure
description: The Full-Version hack of Luigi Stardust Adventure is here! This is a ROM hack of Super Mario World.

name: Pink or Blue
description: Choose the image in the center if its pink or blue

name: MeChat: Love Secrets
description:
Find your perfect match with MeChat!
Welcome to the game with a fully new virtual date experience! Live through the stories where you make choices and your choices impact the story.

name: Meat Lead Fire
description: Annihilate hordes of monster bugs in last stand endless tower defence, deaths is with every second, yours or them.

name: Kraken Smash: Volleyball
description: Squids play volleyball! Smash the ball in your friend's face and start a fight with them that will last at least for the 10 generations to come. You can play with up to 4 players, which means you can lose 3 friends at the same time.

name: Lazy Postman
description: Lazy Postman is a top-down 3D runner in which you have not one, or even two, but a dozen main characters that spend all their energy trying to stay at their job. Help couriers not to lose their means of subsistence and prove that a human is better than a robot!

name: Zombies Everywhere
description: When you are holed up alone in a room for 100 days, your food and strength are running out. Outside the corridor, the Walking Dead are walking around. From time to time, there are screams of pain and terror. If there is a future at the end of the world, what will you do on the 101st day?

name: Smite: Digital Deluxe Edition 2021
description:
Go Ahead. Play God! The SMITE Digital Deluxe Edition is the premier way to join the Battleground of the Gods.

This amazing bundle includes the Ultimate God Pack and the Season Pass 2021 at an instant savings over buying them separately.

name: 王国的魔法战争
description: Sin descripción

name: Skill at Time
description: Skill at Time is a 2D shooter game where the player shoots down hordes of zombies using a flying skillet and his dexterity. Copters with bombs fly around, and the player needs to dodge the pans, which land and increase with each passing world.

name: Cinders of Hades
description: Cinders of Hades is a relaxing, wave shooter arcade-style VR game that all ages will enjoy. It has some classic, arcade influences translated to VR that veteran arcade players will appreciate.

name: ZombieVan Drive
description: ZombieVan Drive is an arcade survival game in which you have to drive ZombieVan to exterminate zombies on the road.

name: Dead Cells: The Fatal Seed Bundle
description: Dead Cells base game plus our two paid DLCs. The definitive “for now” version of Dead Cells…

name: Collapse
description: Challenge your building skills, record the fastest time you can finish a game, and watch out for collapses

name: Vamp Night
description: Experience the life of a bloodthirsty vampire in this new town full of dangers and surprises.

name: Our Church and Halloween: Story Four
description: In a small village on the edge of the island, a young resident named James leaves in search of something. And what is he looking for? He's trying to get to the mountain top before Halloween. He received a letter claiming that if he goes there before Halloween begins, he can bring his parents back from the dead. Is the note correct? Is it good or evil? What's really beyond the forest?

name: Zombie Apocalypse
description: Horrible zombies are attacking, as the most rewarded zombie fighter, you've been designated to find, blast and kill them anywhere they hide. Make you way from cemetery to city suburbs and desolated landscapes for mankind relief. Zombie Apocalypse Attack is a blasting / shooting game in full 3D where emphasis has been put to fast-paced action. 10 different guns to choose from. Will you survive zombie inferno this time again?

name: Curve Racer
description: Curve Racer is an intense arcade racing game where you need to get the highest score possible. You can acquire an amazing score if you avoid any of the cars or obstacles that come in your way. The vehicle won’t stop, so all you can do is to guide it through all the perils as much as possible. The Curve Racer game brings in lots of cars to choose from, all of which pertain to specific categories. You get to customize your driving experience via numerous car upgrades, and you can also acquire map parts that will make browsing through the world a whole lot easier. Immerse yourself in a cool, fun racing experience only with Curve Racer! Features: Intense arcade racing Upgrade your cars and get map parts 4 game modes, free ride, time trial, single lane and dual lane Use boosters like coins, magnets, high speed or car parts Numerous missions to choose from It’s very easy to change environments!

name: Smol Ame
description: A 2D platformer starring Watson Amelia and her friends, based on Walfie's "smol Ame" drawings.

name: The Sims 4: Paranormal Stuff
description: Light the candles and prepare the rituals to appease your ghastly new roommates with The Sims 4: Paranormal Stuff. Spectral guests cause mischief and mayhem on Haunted House Lots, but Sims can perform a séance, befriend Guidry the Ghost, become a Paranormal Investigator, and restore order.

name: Wholesome Slaughter
description: Wholesome Slaughter is a retro style FPS set in a fantasy world! After stumbling into an unknown dimension, you must fight your way through hordes of the cute and innocent inhabitants of the land.

name: Dead Cells: Fatal Falls
description: Gain a sharp and somewhat overprotective aerial ally as you fight through two new biomes and a boss! Challenging level designs will force you to rethink your approach in this new mid game content designed to add variety to your runs and continue support for the development of the game.
